data.title: Giannini, How to Solve the Gender Inclusion Problem
meta_keywords: Social-Position Accounts of Gender;Gender Identity;Gender Inclusion Problem;Disability Inclusion Problem;Feminist Metaphysics;Gender;Metaphysics of Gender;Conceptual Engineering;Ameliorative Inquiry
data.meta_description: The inclusion problem for theories of gender arises when those theories inappropriately fail to include certain individuals in the gender categories to which they ought to belong. The inclusion problem affects ...
